title: Mag 7 earnings, Netflix-WBD hearing, jobs report: What to Watch
title_zh: Mag 7 财报、Netflix-WBD 听证会、就业报告：看点
summary: Market Domination Overtime Host Josh Lipton previews several of the biggest stories to come throughout next, including earnings results from major companies like Alphabet (GOOG, GOOGL), Amazon (AMZN), and Disney (DIS); a Senate hearing on Netflix's (NFLX) buyout bid for W...
summary_zh: 市场统治加班主持人乔什·利普顿 (Josh Lipton) 预览了接下来将要讲述的几个重大故事，包括 Alphabet (GOOG、GOOGL)、亚马逊 (AMZN) 和迪士尼 (DIS) 等大公司的盈利结果；参议院就 Netflix (NFLX) 收购 W....

title: Nvidia's plan to invest up to $100 billion in OpenAI has stalled, WSJ reports
title_zh: 据《华尔街日报》报道，英伟达向 OpenAI 投资高达 1000 亿美元的计划已陷入停滞
summary: Nvidia's plan to invest up to $100 billion in OpenAI to help it train and run its latest artificial-intelligence models has stalled ​after some inside the chip giant expressed doubts about the deal, the ‌Wall Street Journal reported on Friday.
summary_zh: 据《华尔街日报》周五报道，Nvidia 计划向 OpenAI 投资高达 1000 亿美元，以帮助其训练和运行最新的人工智能模型，但在该芯片巨头的一些内部人士对这笔交易表示怀疑后，该计划已陷入停滞。

title: US stocks end lower after Trump names Fed Chair nominee
title_zh: 特朗普任命美联储主席候选人后美股收低

title: Exclusive-Saks ending e-commerce partnership with Amazon, source says
title_zh: 消息人士称 Exclusive-Saks 终止与亚马逊的电子商务合作伙伴关系
summary: Bankrupt retailer Saks Global is ending its "Saks on Amazon" partnership with e-commerce giant Amazon.com, a source ​with direct knowledge of the decision said on Friday.
summary_zh: 一位直接了解该决定的消息人士周五表示，破产零售商 Saks Global 将终止与电子商务巨头 Amazon.com 的“Saks on Amazon”合作关系。

title: Analysis-Combining SpaceX with xAI may be simple for Musk Inc, but Tesla isn't so easy
title_zh: 分析——将 SpaceX 与 xAI 结合对于马斯克公司来说可能很简单，但特斯拉就没那么容易了
summary: Elon Musk fans and the man himself have long mused about Musk Inc, a merger of companies owned by the world's richest man.
summary_zh: 埃隆·马斯克的粉丝和他本人长期以来一直在思考马斯克公司，这是一家由世界首富拥有的公司合并而成的公司。

title: Google defeats bid for billions of dollars of new penalties in US privacy class action
title_zh: 谷歌在美国隐私集体诉讼中未能获得数十亿美元的新处罚
summary: Alphabet's Google persuaded a federal judge in San Francisco on Friday to reject a bid by consumers for more than $2 billion in penalties ​over the company’s past collection of data from users who had switched off a key ‌privacy setting. Chief U.S.
summary_zh: Alphabet 旗下的谷歌周五说服了旧金山的一位联邦法官，驳回了消费者提出的超过 20 亿美元罚款的请求，因为该公司过去从关闭关键隐私设置的用户那里收集了数据。美国首席

title: Earnings live: Verizon, Sandisk stocks surge to cap a Big Tech-heavy earnings week
title_zh: 财报实时公布：Verizon、Sandisk 股价飙升，为大型科技股带来的财报周画上句号
summary: More Big Tech earnings are ahead, with results from Amazon and Alphabet on deck.
summary_zh: 随着亚马逊和 Alphabet 的业绩公布，更多大型科技公司的财报即将公布。

title: Stock market today: Dow, S&P 500, Nasdaq slide to cap volatile week and month, metals sink after Trump taps Warsh for Fed
title_zh: 今日股市：道琼斯指数、标准普尔 500 指数、纳斯达克指数下滑，限制一周和一个月的波动，特朗普任命沃什担任美联储主席后，金属下跌
summary: Major gauges are set to end the week higher with earnings and the Fed holding investor attention.
summary_zh: 随着企业财报和美联储吸引投资者的注意力，主要指标预计本周将走高。

title: Elon Musk's SpaceX may merge with Tesla or xAI: Bloomberg
title_zh: 埃隆·马斯克 (Elon Musk) 的 SpaceX 可能会与特斯拉或 xAI 合并：彭博社
summary: Elon Musk's SpaceX (SPAX.PVT) may reportedly merge with Tesla (TSLA) or xAI (XAAI.PVT), according to Bloomberg.Yahoo Finance Senior Autos Reporter Pras Subramanian and Yahoo Finance Technology Editor Dan Howley sit down with Market Domination host Josh Lipton to explain what w...
summary_zh: 据彭博社报道，埃隆·马斯克 (Elon Musk) 旗下的 SpaceX (SPAX.PVT) 可能会与特斯拉 (TSLA) 或 xAI (XAAI.PVT) 合并。 雅虎财经高级汽车记者 Pras Subramanian 和雅虎财经技术编辑 Dan Howley 与《市场...
